title: Synthesis and biological research of new imidazolone-sulphonamide-pyrimidine hybrids as potential EGFR-TK inhibitors and apoptosis-inducing agents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20120-20129
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03157A, Paper

Dalal Nasser Binjawhar, Hanadi A. Katouah, Najla A. Alshaye, Jawaher Alharthi, Ghadi Alsharif, Fahmy G. Elsaid, Eman Fayad, Ali H. Abu Almaaty
A sequence of novel imidazolone-sulphonamide-pyrimidine hybrids was synthesized and evaluated for in vitro cytotoxicity against MCF-7 breast cancer cell line.
